help.content:
`ğŸ‘‹` Hello! I am <@{bot}>, a music bot. You can use `{prefix}help <command>` to get more information about a command.

`ğŸ‘` Vote for the bot to unlock features! [Vote Here](https://top.gg/bot/{client}/vote) 

**Categories**

I left <#{voiceChannel}> because I was left alone. 

To enable 24/7 mode, use the `24/7` command. Unlock more features by voting, or gain access to exclusive features with our premium version.

Remove the first song in the queue.
Remove the last song in the queue.
